snippet: Alvin Ailey American Dance Theater unveiled a new addition to the repertory with Jiri Kylian’s sensuous “Petite Mort” at City Center.
abstract: Claudia La Rocco reviews performance by Alvin Ailey Dance Theater at City Center.
lead_paragraph: Alvin Ailey American Dance Theater unveiled a new addition to the repertory with Jiri Kylian’s sensuous “Petite Mort” at City Center.

headline.seo: Alvin Ailey With Jiri Kylian’s ‘Petite Mort’ at City Center
headline.main: The Sexual Duel in an Eyebrow-Raising Ballet
